ovdesc.p: This screen is used to store the accounts of correspondent banks with which the processing bank shares a LORO or NOSTRO relationship.

desc.p: Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Specifies the date until which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
Date and Time when the record was created in DD MON 2015 HH:MM:SS.MMM format
User ID of the record creator
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
The Account Owning BIC provides the BIC that owns the account.
A Bank can have more than 1 LORO or more than 1 NOSTRO account.

If there are more than 1 LORO accounts then this field will be used to decide the LORO account to use for crediting. If there are more than one NOSTRO accounts then this field will be used to decide the NOSTRO account to use for crediting.
A Bank can have more than 1 LORO or more than 1 NOSTRO account.

If there are more than 1 LORO accounts then this field will be used to decide the LORO account to use for debiting. If there are more than one NOSTRO accounts then this field will be used to decide the NOSTRO account to use for debiting.
Validation Rules:
1) Mandatory.
2) Allowed values are 'Y' and 'N'.
3) Cannot define 'Y' to more than one PreferredDebitAccountNumber.
4) Must define 'Y' to atleast one PreferredDebitAccountNumber.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
Possible values:
N - Not active
A - Active
H - History
F - Future
C - Not active future
Specifies the currency of the account.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Possible values:
L - Live
U - Unapproved
R - Reversed
Specifies the date from which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.
Specifies the account number.
Specifies the ID of the company owning the account entry.
Stores the real account number in the Holding Bank.Used for enriching Swift tag 53B
Specifies the type of the account number.
Date and Time when the record was approved in DD MON 2015 HH:MM:SS.MMM format
User ID of the record approver
Holds the BIC's/LEI's for which the account entry needs to be checked.
This can be a BIC-8 or a BIC-11 field.
Can be a BIC-8 or BIC-8*.
For example, it can be given as a BIC-8* (eg DEUTDEFF*) or just a BIC-8 (eg DEUTDEFF).

For a BIC-8* (eg DEUTDEFF*), this entry is applicable for all the defined BIC-8's and BIC-11's linked to DEUTDEFF. For example, a BIC - DEUTDEFF500,DEUTDEFF501 or DEUTDEFF will go on to select the entry for DEUTDEFF*.
For a BIC-8 entry (eg DEUTDEFF), this entry is applicable only for DEUTDEFF and not for the BIC-11's linked to DEUTDEFF.
If this flag is set then the account would be used for charges. (Applicable only for LORO's)
Used to store the Short Name of the account
